data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pimenta, Bruno V. S., Caramaschi, Ulisses (2007): New species of toad, genus Frostius Cannatella, 1986, from the Atlantic Rain Forest of Bahia, Brazil (Amphibia, Anura, Bufonidae). Zootaxa 1508: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177201
